entries.title: Everyone's watching Meta's earnings report for a hint at how online ads are doing
entries.description: Meta, Apple, Google, Amazon and Snap are slated to report earnings this week, as an economic slowdown and Apple privacy changes weigh on prospects.

entries.title: BP says demand for oil and gas will drop dramatically by 2050 in 'decisive shift'
entries.description: In its annual energy outlook report, BP said security, affordability, and sustainability make up the "energy trilemma" which will drive global energy demand.

entries.title: Showtime to combine with Paramount+, rebrand with new name
entries.description: Paramount Global is combining its premium cable network Showtime with streaming service Paramount+.

entries.title: Apple's expected to post its first revenue decline since 2019 on Thursday
entries.description: Apple reports December quarter earnings on Thursday, and there are a lot of factors pointing to the company's first year-over-year revenue decline since 2019.

entries.title: Chaos and intrigue reign in UK court fight over Castro-era Cuban debt
entries.description: A trial over unpaid Cuban sovereign debt enterted its second week at the UK High Court.

entries.title: Ford and General Motors enter a new phase of uncertainty on prices and demand
entries.description: Ford and General Motors are set to report earnings this week.

entries.title: WHO says Covid remains a global emergency but pandemic could near its end in 2023
entries.description: The WHO chief has previously said the end of the pandemic is in sight.

entries.title: Ford cuts prices on electric Mustang Mach-E, following Tesla's lead
entries.description: Ford said Monday it will lower the price of the Mach-E, which is comparable to Tesla's Model Y, by an average of about $4,500, depending on the model.

entries.title: Mining giant Rio Tinto apologizes for sparking radiation alert after losing device in Australia
entries.description: A radioactive capsule used in its Western Australia mining operations is missing and believed to have fallen off a truck.

entries.title: Premier League signs deal with NFT-based fantasy soccer game despite crypto downturn
entries.description: Players of fantasy soccer game Sorare will be able to purchase and use official Premier League-licensed NFTs under an exclusive multi-year agreement.

entries.title: Erdogan suggests Turkey could accept Finland into NATO — without Sweden
entries.description: Erdogan, angry at Sweden's government for a number of reasons, is poised to make or break both countries' NATO accession plans.

entries.title: Most Adani shares continue bloodbath as Asia's richest man loses $28 billion in a month
entries.description: Shares of most of Adani Group companies continued to see sharp losses for a third consecutive trading session.

entries.title: London's luxury home sellers turn to WhatsApp as private sales surge
entries.description: A growing number of Londoners are opting for novel means of buying and selling their properties, with WhatsApp emerging as a new home for luxury listings.

entries.title: Debt restructuring framework must improve to help distressed countries, Pakistan's ex-central banker says
entries.description: The global framework over sovereign debt financing needs to improve so that emerging market economies can get out of their debt problems faster, says Reza Baqir.

entries.title: Renault slashes Nissan stake as the automakers overhaul their decades-long alliance
entries.description: Renault has trimmed its interest in coalition ally Nissan stake as the automakers overhaul their decades-long union.

entries.title: Europe's crackdown on Big Tech omitted TikTok — but now that's set to change
entries.description: TikTok is beginning to feel the sting of political and regulatory pressure in Europe, where the Chinese-owned app has evaded the scrutiny it's faced in the U.S.

entries.title: Tourism is roaring back in China. But the $6 trillion consumer market is digging itself out of a deep slump
entries.description: China's consumption recovery from zero-Covid is getting off to a solid start – after a depressing fourth quarter.
